feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:20 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
